00023 #include <FWMath.h>

00026 Define_Module(ConstSpeedMobility);

00035 void ConstSpeedMobility::initialize(int stage)
00036 {
00037     BaseMobility::initialize(stage);
00038 
00039     if (stage == 0) {
00040         move.speed = par("speed").doubleValue();
00041 
00042         if(move.speed <= 0)
00043       move.speed = 0;
00044 
00045   numSteps = 0;
00046   step = -1;
00047   stepSize = Coord(0,0,0);
00048 
00049         EV << "Initialize: move speed: " << move.speed << " (" << par("speed").doubleValue() << ")"
00050            << " pos: " << move.info() << endl;
00051     }
00052     else if( stage == 1 ){
00053   stepTarget = move.startPos;
00054     } 
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00062 void ConstSpeedMobility::setTargetPosition()
00063 {
00064     EV << "start setTargetPosistion: " << move.info() << endl;
00065 
00066     do{
00067   targetPos = getRandomPosition();
00068 
00069   double distance = move.startPos.distance(targetPos);
00070   simtime_t totalTime = distance / move.speed;
00071   numSteps = FWMath::round(totalTime / updateInterval);
00072 
00073   EV << "new targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << " distance=" << distance 
00074      << " totalTime=" << totalTime << " numSteps=" << numSteps << endl;
00075     }
00076     while( numSteps == 0 );
00077 
00078     stepSize = targetPos - move.startPos;
00079 
00080     stepSize = stepSize / numSteps;
00081 
00082     stepTarget = move.startPos + stepSize;
00083 
00084     EV << "stepSize: " << stepSize.info() << " target: " << (stepSize*numSteps).info() << endl;
00085 
00086     step = 0;
00087     move.setDirection(targetPos);
00088 
00089     EV << "end setTargetPosistion: " << move.info() << endl;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00097 void ConstSpeedMobility::makeMove()
00098 {
00099     // increment number of steps
00100     step++;
00101 
00102     if( step == numSteps ){
00103   // last step
00104   //stepSize.x = 
00105   // step forward
00106   move.startPos = stepTarget;
00107   move.startTime = simTime();
00108 
00109   EV << "stepping forward. step #=" << step
00110      << " startPos: " << move.startPos.info() << endl;
00111 
00112 
00113   // get new target position
00114   EV << "destination reached.\n"
00115      << move.info() << endl;
00116   setTargetPosition();
00117     }
00118     else if( step < numSteps ){
00119   // step forward
00120   move.startPos = stepTarget;
00121   stepTarget += stepSize;
00122   move.startTime = simTime();
00123 
00124   EV << "stepping forward. step #=" << step
00125      << " startPos: " << move.startPos.info() << endl;
00126 
00127     }
00128     else{
00129   error("step cannot be bigger than numSteps");
00130     }
00131 
00132     //    fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00133 }
